# Welcome

Hi, I'm Vanshaj - MSc Physics graduate and quantum computing enthusiast currently participating in Google Summer of Code 2025.

I'm working on developing a **Hamiltonian Library for QuTiP**, contributing to the open-source quantum simulation ecosystem. This blog documents my journey through GSoC and explores various topics in quantum computing, software development, and open source.
